name: JoKart
description:
Followed the step by step tutorial from Brackeys! Like seriously, I shouldn't even have posted this game, after all it's not mine. What am I doing with my life? 

And yes, since I was really bored by the 8th video in Brackeys tutorial, I SKIPPED Level System, so the game has only one level, should you even call it a level, i dunno

Dont know brackey?
